turtles.name: Loggerhead Sea Turtle
turtles.role_in_ecosystem: Maintain healthy seagrass beds and coral reefs.

turtles.name: Green Sea Turtle
turtles.role_in_ecosystem: Help maintain seagrass ecosystems by grazing.

turtles.name: Leatherback Sea Turtle
turtles.reason_for_endangerment: Entanglement in fishing gear, climate change.

sharks.name: Great White Shark
sharks.role_in_ecosystem: Apex predator, regulates populations of fish and marine mammals.

sharks.name: Whale Shark
sharks.role_in_ecosystem: Helps maintain balance in plankton populations.

sharks.name: Hammerhead Shark
sharks.role_in_ecosystem: Regulates fish populations and prevents overgrazing of coral reefs.

whales.name: Blue Whale
whales.role_in_ecosystem: Helps maintain healthy plankton populations and nutrient cycles.

whales.name: Humpback Whale
whales.role_in_ecosystem: Aids nutrient cycling by feeding and releasing nutrients in deeper waters.

whales.name: Orca
whales.role_in_ecosystem: Top predator, regulates populations of marine animals.

seals.name: Harp Seal
seals.role_in_ecosystem: Helps control fish populations and maintain balance in marine ecosystems.

seals.name: Sea Otter
seals.role_in_ecosystem: Regulates sea urchin populations, helping kelp forests thrive.

seals.name: Weddell Seal
seals.role_in_ecosystem: Controls fish and squid populations in polar regions.

fish.name: Atlantic Bluefin Tuna
fish.role_in_ecosystem: Top predator in marine food webs, controls prey populations.

fish.name: Napoleon Wrasse
fish.role_in_ecosystem: Helps control the populations of smaller fish and invertebrates.

fish.name: Clownfish
fish.reason_for_endangerment: Habitat loss due to coral reef destruction.
fish.role_in_ecosystem: Helps maintain coral health by cleaning anemones.
